str2: Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) speed, haste, (b) diligence, earnestness, enthusiasm. From speudo; 'speed', i.e. despatch, eagerness, earnestness.
Slothful, backward, hesitating; of things: irksome. From okneo; tardy, i.e. Indolent; irksome.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (lit: I boil, am boiling), I burn (in spirit), am fervent. A primary verb; to be hot, i.e. be fervid.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To be a slave, be subject to, obey, be devoted. From doulos; to be a slave to.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
